solution_line_template: The cost Rachel should budget for her pair of shoes is ${sara_shoes} * {multiplier} = $<<{sara_shoes}*{multiplier}={rachel_shoes}>>{rachel_shoes}.
The cost Rachel should budget for her dress is ${sara_dress} * {multiplier} = $<<{sara_dress}*{multiplier}={rachel_dress}>>{rachel_dress}.
The total Rachel should budget is ${rachel_shoes} + ${rachel_dress} = $<<{rachel_shoes}+{rachel_dress}={total_budget}>>{total_budget}.
